<!-- Code generated by generrordocs.go; DO NOT EDIT. -->

```
RepeatedDecl occurs when an identifier occurs more than once on the left
hand side of a short variable declaration.

Example:
 func _() {
 	x, y, y := 1, 2, 3
 }
```
